mapper.sql: ID, A0100, RF_B0000, INBOUND_FLAG, RF_STATUS, CHECK_STATUS, INCUMBENCY_STATUS, DATA_TYPE, SURNAME, NAME, SEX, BIRTH_DATE, BIRTH_DATE_GB,IDNUMBER_GA, NATION_CODE, NATION_NAME, IDNUMBER_GB, POLITICAL_AFFICODE,POLITICAL_AFFINAME, HEALTH_CODE, HEALTH, REGISTE_RESIDENCE_CODE, REGISTE_RESIDENCE, WORK_UNIT, POST_CODE, POST, PERSON_MANAGER, IDENTITY_CODE, IDENTITY, SECRET_LEVEL, DECRYPT_STARTDATE, DECRYPT_ENDDATE, MAIN_LEADER, LICENCE_IDENTITY, NF, FJGNF, XRXGW, LQGZ, DQGZ, REPLYOPINION, ABROADTIME, REASON, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER, MODIFY_TIME,MODIFY_USER, SORT_ID, PY, SECRET_POST,EXIT_DATE,FINISH_TIME,RZ_DATE
mapper.select:
select * from OMS_REG_PROCPERSONINFO where IDENTITY_CODE='1'
and DATA_TYPE = #{dataType}

SELECT info.SURNAME, info.NAME, info.A0100 FROM oms_reg_procpersoninfo info LEFT JOIN oms_smr_personinfo smr on info.A0100 = smr.A0100 LEFT JOIN a01 a1 on info.A0100 = a1.a0100 LEFT JOIN a30 a3 on a1.a0100 = a3.a0100 WHERE a3.a3001='免职'
AND ((CONCAT(IFNULL(SURNAME,''),IFNULL(NAME,'')) LIKE '%${name}%') or (SURNAME LIKE '%${name}%'))
mapper.insert:
insert into oms_reg_procpersoninfo (ID, A0100, RF_B0000, INBOUND_FLAG, RF_STATUS, CHECK_STATUS, INCUMBENCY_STATUS, DATA_TYPE, SURNAME, NAME, SEX, BIRTH_DATE, BIRTH_DATE_GB,NATION_CODE, NATION_NAME, IDNUMBER_GB,IDNUMBER_GA, POLITICAL_AFFICODE,POLITICAL_AFFINAME, HEALTH, REGISTE_RESIDENCE_CODE, REGISTE_RESIDENCE, WORK_UNIT, POST_CODE, POST, PERSON_MANAGER, IDENTITY_CODE, IDENTITY, SECRET_LEVEL, DECRYPT_STARTDATE, DECRYPT_ENDDATE, MAIN_LEADER, LICENCE_IDENTITY, NF, FJGNF, XRXGW, LQGZ, DQGZ, REPLYOPINION, ABROADTIME, REASON, CREATE_TIME,CREATE_USER,MODIFY_TIME,MODIFY_USER, SORT_ID,PY,SECRET_POST,EXIT_DATE,FINISH_TIME,RZ_DATE ) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.a0100,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.rfB0000,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.inboundFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.rfStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.checkStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.incumbencyStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.dataType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.surname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.birthDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.birthDateGb,jdbcType=DATE},#{item.nationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.nationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.idnumberGb,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.idnumberGa,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.politicalAfficode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.politicalAffiname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.health,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.registeResidenceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.registeResidence,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.workUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.postCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.post,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.personManager,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.identityCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.identity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.secretLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.decryptStartdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.decryptEnddate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.mainLeader,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.licenceIdentity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.nf,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.fjgnf,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.xrxgw,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.lqgz,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.dqgz,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.replyopinion,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.abroadtime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.modifyTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.modifyUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.sortId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.py,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.secretPost,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.exitDate,jdbcType=DATE},#{item.finishTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.rzDate,jdbcType=DATE} )
mapper.select: SELECT T_Status.CODE, T_Status.NAME, IFNULL(T_Main.Cnt, '0') VALUE FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT 'U' code, '新增' name UNION SELECT 'I' code, '修改' name UNION SELECT 'D' code, '撤销' name ) T_Status ) T_Status LEFT JOIN ( SELECT INBOUND_FLAG, Count(INBOUND_FLAG) Cnt FROM oms_reg_procpersoninfo GROUP BY INBOUND_FLAG ) T_Main ON T_Main.INBOUND_FLAG = T_Status.code

SELECT T_Status.CODE, T_Status.NAME, IFNULL(T_Main.Cnt, '0') VALUE FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT '1' code, '省管干部' name UNION SELECT '2' code, '科级以上公务员' name UNION SELECT '3' code, '涉密人员' name UNION SELECT '4' code, '重要岗位人' name UNION SELECT '5' code, '重点监管人员' name UNION SELECT '9' code, '其他人员' name ) T_Status ) T_Status LEFT JOIN ( SELECT IDENTITY_CODE, Count(IDENTITY_CODE) Cnt FROM oms_reg_procpersoninfo GROUP BY IDENTITY_CODE ) T_Main ON T_Main.IDENTITY_CODE = T_Status.code

select count(orp.MAIN_LEADER=1) as acount,-- 主要领导 count(orp.NF='1') as bcount,-- 裸官 count(orp.SECRET_LEVEL=3)as count,-- 核心涉密人员 count(orp.SECRET_LEVEL=2) as dcount,-- 一般涉密人员 count(orp.REPLYOPINION=1)as ecount,-- 纪委不回复意见人员1是，0否 count(orp.LQGZ=1)as fcount, -- 离琼挂职 count(orp.DQGZ=1)as gcount -- 到琼挂职 from oms_reg_procpersoninfo orp

SELECT ID, A0100, CASE WHEN data_type = '1' THEN '干部' ELSE '公安' END AS Data_Type, CONCAT(SURNAME, `NAME`) AS 'Name', CASE WHEN SEX = '1' THEN '男' ELSE '女' END AS SEX, CASE WHEN IDNUMBER_GB IS NULL THEN IDNUMBER_GA ELSE IDNUMBER_GB END AS IDNUMBER_GB, WORK_UNIT, POST FROM oms_reg_procpersoninfo WHERE 1=1
AND id IN ( SELECT a.ID FROM oms_reg_procpersoninfo a INNER JOIN oms_reg_procpersoninfo b ON a.IDNUMBER_GB = b.IDNUMBER_GA AND a.data_type = '1' AND b.data_type = '2' ) OR id IN ( SELECT b.ID FROM oms_reg_procpersoninfo a INNER JOIN oms_reg_procpersoninfo b ON a.IDNUMBER_GB = b.IDNUMBER_GA AND a.data_type = '1' AND b.data_type = '2' ) ORDER BY CASE WHEN IDNUMBER_GB IS NULL THEN IDNUMBER_GA ELSE IDNUMBER_GB END
AND id IN ( SELECT a.ID FROM oms_reg_procpersoninfo a INNER JOIN oms_reg_procpersoninfo b ON a.SURNAME = b.SURNAME AND a.`NAME` = B.`NAME` AND a.data_type = '1' AND b.data_type = '2' ) OR id IN ( SELECT b.ID FROM oms_reg_procpersoninfo a INNER JOIN oms_reg_procpersoninfo b ON a.SURNAME = b.SURNAME AND a.`NAME` = B.`NAME` AND a.data_type = '1' AND b.data_type = '2' ) ORDER BY SURNAME, `NAME`, WORK_UNIT

select * from oms_reg_procpersoninfo where 1=1
and ID in
#{id}
order by DATA_TYPE

SELECT p.ID AS id, p.A0100 AS a0100, p.RF_B0000 AS rfB0000, p.INBOUND_FLAG AS inboundFlag, p.RF_STATUS AS rfStatus, p.CHECK_STATUS AS checkStatus, p.INCUMBENCY_STATUS AS incumbencyStatus, p.DATA_TYPE AS dataType, p.SURNAME AS surname, p.NAME AS name, CASE WHEN p.SEX = '1' THEN '男' ELSE '女' END AS sex, p.BIRTH_DATE AS birthDate, p.BIRTH_DATE_GB AS birthDateGb, p.IDNUMBER_GA AS idnumberGa, p.NATION_CODE AS nationCode, p.NATION_NAME AS nationName, p.IDNUMBER_GB AS idnumberGb, p.IDNUMBER_GA AS idnumberGa, p.POLITICAL_AFFICODE AS politicalAfficode, p.POLITICAL_AFFINAME AS politicalAffiname, p.HEALTH_CODE AS healthCode, p.HEALTH AS health, p.REGISTE_RESIDENCE_CODE AS registeResidenceCode, p.REGISTE_RESIDENCE AS registeResidence, p.WORK_UNIT AS workUnit, p.POST_CODE AS postCode, p.POST AS post, p.PERSON_MANAGER AS personManager, p.IDENTITY_CODE AS identityCode, p.IDENTITY AS identity, p.SECRET_LEVEL AS secretLevel, p.DECRYPT_STARTDATE AS decryptStartdate, p.DECRYPT_ENDDATE AS decryptEnddate, p.MAIN_LEADER AS mainLeader, p.LICENCE_IDENTITY AS licenceIdentity, p.NF AS nf, p.FJGNF AS fjgnf, p.XRXGW AS xrxgw, p.LQGZ AS lqgz, p.DQGZ AS dqgz, p.REPLYOPINION AS replyopinion, p.ABROADTIME AS abroadtime, p.REASON AS reason, p.CREATE_TIME AS createTime, p.CREATE_USER AS createUser, p.MODIFY_TIME AS modifyTime, p.MODIFY_USER AS modifyUser, p.SORT_ID AS sortId, p.PY AS py, p.SECRET_POST AS secretPost, p.EXIT_DATE AS exitDate, p.FINISH_TIME AS finishTime, p.RZ_DATE AS finishTime, b.ORGANIZATION_CODE AS organizationCode, b.CONTACTS AS contacts, b.PHONE AS phone, b.B0101 AS b0101 FROM oms_reg_procpersoninfo p left join b01 b on p.RF_B0000 = b.B0100 WHERE 1=1
and p.ID in
#{id}
and p.DATA_TYPE =1 AND p.CHECK_STATUS=0

select T_1.item_name as SEX , T_3.item_name as INCUMBENCY_STATUS, T_4.item_name as RF_STATUS, T_5.item_name as CHECK_STATUS, T_6.item_name as POLITICAL_AFFI, T_7.item_name as SECRET_LEVEL, T_8.item_name as DATA_TYPE, b01.B0101, info.* from oms_reg_procpersoninfo info LEFT JOIN B01 b01 on info.RF_B0000 = b01.B0100 LEFT JOIN (SELECT T_1.item_code,T_1.item_name FROM SYS_DICT_ITEM T_1,SYS_DICT sd WHERE sd.DICT_CODE = 'GB2261' AND T_1.DICT_CODE = sd.DICT_CODE) T_1 ON info.SEX = T_1.item_code LEFT JOIN (SELECT T_3.item_code,T_3.item_name FROM SYS_DICT_ITEM T_3,SYS_DICT sd WHERE sd.DICT_CODE = 'ZZZT' AND T_3.DICT_CODE = sd.DICT_CODE) T_3 ON info.INCUMBENCY_STATUS = T_3.item_code LEFT JOIN (SELECT T_4.item_code,T_4.item_name FROM SYS_DICT_ITEM T_4,SYS_DICT sd WHERE sd.DICT_CODE = 'BAZT' AND T_4.DICT_CODE = sd.DICT_CODE) T_4 ON info.RF_STATUS = T_4.item_code LEFT JOIN (SELECT T_5.item_code,T_5.item_name FROM SYS_DICT_ITEM T_5,SYS_DICT sd WHERE sd.DICT_CODE = 'YSZT' AND T_5.DICT_CODE = sd.DICT_CODE) T_5 ON info.CHECK_STATUS = T_5.item_code LEFT JOIN (SELECT T_6.item_code,T_6.item_name FROM SYS_DICT_ITEM T_6,SYS_DICT sd WHERE sd.DICT_CODE = 'GB4762' -- 政治面貌 AND T_6.DICT_CODE = sd.DICT_CODE) T_6 ON info.POLITICAL_AFFICODE = T_6.item_code LEFT JOIN (SELECT T_7.item_code,T_7.item_name FROM SYS_DICT_ITEM T_7,SYS_DICT sd WHERE sd.DICT_CODE = 'SMDJ' -- 涉密等级 AND T_7.DICT_CODE = sd.DICT_CODE) T_7 ON info.SECRET_LEVEL = T_7.item_code LEFT JOIN (SELECT T_8.item_code,T_8.item_name FROM SYS_DICT_ITEM T_8,SYS_DICT sd WHERE sd.DICT_CODE = 'SJLY' -- 数据来源 AND T_8.DICT_CODE = sd.DICT_CODE) T_8 ON info.DATA_TYPE = T_8.item_code AND info.INBOUND_FLAG != 'D' AND info.DATA_TYPE = '2' AND info.INCUMBENCY_STATUS not in (1,7) AND info.ID not in (select rf_id from oms_reg_revokeapply where status!='7')
AND info.IDNUMBER_GA = #{idnumberGa}
AND ((CONCAT(IFNULL(info.SURNAME,''),IFNULL(info.NAME,'')) LIKE '%${name}%') or (SURNAME LIKE '%${name}%'))
order by info.SURNAME,info.NAME,info.WORK_UNIT asc
select * from oms_reg_procpersoninfo where IDNUMBER_GB = #{idCard} and DATA_TYPE = '1'

select IDNUMBER_GA from oms_reg_procpersoninfo where 1=1
and DATA_TYPE = #{dataType}
